articles.author: David Montanaro
articles.title: Hawley says House Dems did not lay out an impeachable offense: 'They didn't even charge a crime'
articles.description: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo, vowed Monday he will not vote to impeach President Trump in a Senate trial, claiming House Democrats have failed to even charge a crime against the president.
articles.content:
Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo, vowed Monday he will not vote to impeach President Trump in a Senate trial, claiming House Democrats have failed to even charge a crime against the president.

articles.title: Hallmark claims Hilarie Burton never worked for them after star says she was fired over inclusivity demands
articles.description: Hallmark has responded to Hilarie Burton’s claims that she was “let go” following several inclusivity demands.
articles.content:
Hallmark has responded to Hilarie Burton’s claims that she was “let go” after she made several inclusivity demands.
A rep for the network told Fox News: “Hilarie Burton was not an employee of Crown Media Family Networks.”

articles.title: House Democrat claims top Republican senators looking to 'rig' Trump impeachment trial
articles.description: Rep. Zoe Lofgren, D-Calif., expressed her concern that Senate Republicans appear poised to "rig" the upcoming trial after House Democrats approve articles of impeachment against President Trump.
articles.content:
Rep. Zoe Lofgren, D-Calif., expressed her concern that Senate Republicans appear poised to "rig" the upcoming trial after House Democrats' expected approval of articles of impeachment against President Trump.

articles.title: Harry Kazianis: Here's how Trump should respond to North Korea's next missile test
